pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python package for ArcProxyUtilities #This package contains the utilites which can be leveraged by azure cli extensions for the proxy command of provisioned clusters.### How to use ###Import this package in the cli extension and make sure to add this as a dependency in the respective setup.py file by specifying the latest version number. Configure the proxy command to call client_side_proxy_wrapper() of this package with the required parameters.### CSP Port number usage guidelines ####While passing the csp port number in client_side_proxy_wrapper() from cli extension, make sure that you are passing a port number which is not used by other cli extensions. This will enable users to run multiple instances of proxy in future. .. :changelog:Release History===============1.0.2++++++* ADAL to MSAL auth support for CLI>=2.30.0.1.0.1++++++* Fetching tenantID from graphclient instead of subscription object.1.0.0++++++* Intial release.
